translated: He emanated as a wrathful deity with that name.

original: 'o na khro bo de la ci'i phyir rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na khro bo de la ci'i phyir rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya zhe na /
translated: Then, why is that wrathful deity called Vajrabhairava?

original: zhi bas mi 'dul ba zhe sdang gis gdul dgos pa rnams la 'jigs byed kyi gzugs za za dang / 'cha' 'cha' dang / gdug gdug dang / rngam rngam bzhin du sprul pa ste /
analyzed: zhi bas mi 'dul ba zhe sdang gis gdul dgos pa rnams la 'jigs byed kyi gzugs za za dang / 'cha' 'cha' dang / gdug gdug dang / rngam rngam bzhin du sprul pa ste /
translated: For those who need to be tamed by anger, not by peace, he emanates a form of Bhairava, with bared fangs, devouring, devouring, with a terrifying, terrifying face.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / shin tu gdug par gyur rnams la //
analyzed: de yang / shin tu gdug par gyur rnams la //
translated: For those who are very wicked,

original: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
translated: peace will not be of benefit.

original: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las //🔽khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las // khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
translated: From the essence of wisdom and method,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: the wrathful one is the activity of all the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin du 'di nas mar 'di skad ces bya ba'i mtshan du grags pa'i khro bo cig yod de /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di nas mar 'di skad ces bya ba'i mtshan du grags pa'i khro bo cig yod de /
translated: Thus, from here on, it is known that the wrathful one who is famous by the name of Bhairava exists.

original: rgyud gang la grags /🔽khro bo de @98a * //
analyzed: rgyud gang la grags / khro bo de @98a * //
translated: In which tantra is he famous?

original: dngos su gang yin /
analyzed: dngos su gang yin /
translated: What is that wrathful one actually?

original: khro bo de la ci'i phyir mtshan de skad ces bya zhes kun la sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo de la ci'i phyir mtshan de skad ces bya zhes kun la sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Why is that wrathful one called by that name? It should be known that this is to be applied to all.

original: de la 'jigs par byed ces pa'i khro bo ni rgyud 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las grags /
analyzed: de la 'jigs par byed ces pa'i khro bo ni rgyud 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las grags /
translated: Regarding that, the wrathful one called Bhairava is famous in the Manjushri Bhairava Tantra.

translated: Thus, he is the banner and crest of the Dharma.

original: zhes bya'o // gnyes med kyi 'jam dpal de nyid lha la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gdul ba la sogs gzhon nur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // gnyes med kyi 'jam dpal de nyid lha la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gdul ba la sogs gzhon nur ro //
translated: He is the youthful Manjushri, because he is the youthful body in the three worlds of gods and so forth, to be tamed.

original: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la yang nyan thos sde bzhi'i 'khor na gnas brtan chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston /
analyzed: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la yang nyan thos sde bzhi'i 'khor na gnas brtan chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in the retinue of the four shravaka assemblies in the form of a great elder to those to be tamed by shravakas.

original: rang rgyal gyis 'dul ba la rang rgyal rgan po dang / so so'i skye bo dang / byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba la ri bong la sogs pa'i skyes rabs sam /
analyzed: rang rgyal gyis 'dul ba la rang rgyal rgan po dang / so so'i skye bo dang / byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba la ri bong la sogs pa'i skyes rabs sam /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in the form of an elder pratyekabuddha to those to be tamed by pratyekabuddhas, and in the form of a bodhisattva to those to be tamed by ordinary beings and bodhisattvas.

original: skye dgu 'dul ba'i de thams cad kyi jo bo'am bdag por gyur pa ni rje btsun no //
analyzed: skye dgu 'dul ba'i de thams cad kyi jo bo'am bdag por gyur pa ni rje btsun no //
translated: He is the lord or master of all those who tame living beings.

original: de dang des 'dul ba la de dang de'i slob dpon mdzad pa de mi rigs snyam pa la /
analyzed: de dang des 'dul ba la de dang de'i slob dpon mdzad pa de mi rigs snyam pa la /
translated: It may be thought that it is not right for him to act as the master of those to be tamed by those.

original: cir snang yang gzhi ma grub pa'am ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cir snang yang gzhi ma grub pa'am ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, since whatever appears is not established as a basis or is uncertain, it is not contradictory.

original: 'o na sangs rgyas kyis slob dpon mi mdzad dam snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'o na sangs rgyas kyis slob dpon mi mdzad dam snyam pa la /
translated: It may be thought that the Buddha does not act as a master.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //🔽zhes gsungs te /
translated: He bears the thirty-two marks.

original: zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nas /
analyzed: zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nas /
translated: His feet bear the mark of wheels.🔽

original: ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i bar du sum cu rtsa gnyis ni gtso bo la dpe byad kyis bskor ba'i sku 'chang ba yang rje btsun no //
analyzed: ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i bar du sum cu rtsa gnyis ni gtso bo la dpe byad kyis bskor ba'i sku 'chang ba yang rje btsun no //
translated: The thirty-two marks, from having feet with the mark of wheels up to having eyelashes like a bull, are the marks of the body of the principal one, the Bhagavat, surrounded by the major marks.

original: de la mtshan dpe la yang 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de la mtshan dpe la yang 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'o //
translated: The major and minor marks are mundane and transcendent.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i mtshan dpe ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yang mnga' la /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i mtshan dpe ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yang mnga' la /
translated: The mundane major and minor marks are possessed by a universal monarch.

original: 'das pa ni sangs rgyas la mnga' ba de'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni sangs rgyas la mnga' ba de'o //
translated: The transcendent ones are possessed by the Buddha.

original: 'o na khyad ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na khyad ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between them?🔽The marks of the Sage,

original: thub mtshan yul la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: thub mtshan yul la gnas pa ni //
translated: abiding in the field,

original: gsal ba rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gsal ba rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin // zhes gsungs te /
translated: are clear and complete, so they are superior.

original: thub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan ni yul na brtan par gnas pa dang / gsal ba dang rdzogs pa yin la /
analyzed: thub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan ni yul na brtan par gnas pa dang / gsal ba dang rdzogs pa yin la /
translated: The marks of the Sage, the Buddha, abide stably in the field, are clear, and are complete.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul na mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul na mi gnas te /
translated: The marks of a universal monarch do not abide in the field,

original: yo ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / ma rdzogs pa'i khyad yod do //
analyzed: yo ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / ma rdzogs pa'i khyad yod do //
translated: are unclear, and are incomplete.

original: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
analyzed: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
translated: Beautiful, pleasing to the three worlds.

original: zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi mngon bar 'dod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi mngon bar 'dod par bya ba'am /
translated: He is lovely and beautiful because all sentient beings of the three worlds desire him,

original: lta bas mi ngoms shing chog mi shes @101b pa'i phyir sdug cing mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: lta bas mi ngoms shing chog mi shes @101b pa'i phyir sdug cing mdzes pa'o //
translated: or because he is never satisfied with, or has enough of, looking at him.

original: 'o na de 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon mi byed dam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon mi byed dam zhe na /
translated: Well then, is he not a teacher of the world?

original: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //🔽zhes pa nas mar gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te // zhes pa nas mar gsungs te /
translated: He is a teacher of the world's good knowledge.

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes legs ni yon tan te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes legs ni yon tan te /
translated: The good knowledge of the world is a quality.

original: skal ba dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzo dang thabs la sogs pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mdzad de /
analyzed: skal ba dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzo dang thabs la sogs pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mdzad de /
translated: He is the teacher of all arts and techniques, in accordance with the fortune of the disciples.

original: manydzu'i byin rlabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: manydzu'i byin rlabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he is the blessing of Manjushri.

original: 'o na de nyes skyon can du mi 'gro'am snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'o na de nyes skyon can du mi 'gro'am snyam pa la /
translated: Well then, won't he come to have faults?

original: 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med //🔽ces gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med // ces gsungs te /
translated: He is a fearless teacher of the world.

original: sbrul pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don byed kyang de la snyam pa'am /
analyzed: sbrul pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don byed kyang de la snyam pa'am /
translated: He acts for the welfare of sentient beings through various emanations, but he does not think about that.

original: don byed kyang chags pa med de padma bzhin no //
analyzed: don byed kyang chags pa med de padma bzhin no //
translated: Even though he acts for their welfare, he is without attachment, like a lotus.

original: man ngag tu ni slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan yang 'di nyid kyis mtshon la lta ba rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyi slob dpon byed cing 'dul la skye med kyi gsal 'debs pas gsal byed kyi rgyun du yang 'dug ste
analyzed: man ngag tu ni slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan yang 'di nyid kyis mtshon la lta ba rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyi slob dpon byed cing 'dul la skye med kyi gsal 'debs pas gsal byed kyi rgyun du yang 'dug ste
translated: In the esoteric instructions, even though the master has the characteristics, this is illustrated by this. A yogin who has realized the view is a master of all mundane dharmas, trains, and clarifies non-arising, so he also exists as a clarifier.

original: / snang ba thabs la brten nas stong pa shes rab rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: / snang ba thabs la brten nas stong pa shes rab rtogs par byed do //
translated: Thus, based on the method of appearances, he causes the realization of emptiness, which is wisdom.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mi mthun pa'i 'jigs pa yang med do //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mi mthun pa'i 'jigs pa yang med do //
translated: A yogin who has realized in that way also has no fear of discord.

original: de'i phyir rje btsun de ni mgon skyabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rje btsun de ni mgon skyabs zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, that venerable one is called a protector and refuge.

original: stong pa skye med rtogs na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i brag 'joms pa'i phyir yid gcugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa skye med rtogs na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i brag 'joms pa'i phyir yid gcugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: If one realizes emptiness, non-arising, in order to destroy pride and so on, it is called a friend.

original: de'i phyir de la ni skyabs dang bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir skyob pa dang ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir bla na med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ni skyabs dang bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir skyob pa dang ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir bla na med ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called a refuge and a protector because it is the cause of the good eon buddhas, and it is called unsurpassed because it attains great wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
translated: He enjoys the limits of space.

original: zhes bya bas ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i zab mo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes la legs par gnas shing longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i zab mo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes la legs par gnas shing longs spyod pa'o //
translated: This shows that he is well-established in the wisdom of profound emptiness, which is like space, and enjoys it.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
translated: The ocean of the wisdom of omniscience.

original: zhes pa shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This shows that he has the wisdom of the great scope.

original: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
analyzed: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
translated: He opens the eggshell of ignorance.

original: zhes bya ba ni bya'i rgyu sgo nga'i sbubs yin pa bzhin /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bya'i rgyu sgo nga'i sbubs yin pa bzhin /
translated: Just as the eggshell is the cause of the bird's death,

original: rigs drug ni sems can thams cad kyi byed rgyu yang ma rig pa de sgo nga'i sbubs dang 'dra ba la 'du byed 'joms pa ni 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: rigs drug ni sems can thams cad kyi byed rgyu yang ma rig pa de sgo nga'i sbubs dang 'dra ba la 'du byed 'joms pa ni 'jam dpal lo //
translated: so ignorance is the cause of all sentient beings. Manjushri is the destroyer of the formations.

original: srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //🔽de nyid las mi thar ba'i phyir dra ba can de yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o // de nyid las mi thar ba'i phyir dra ba can de yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The five aggregates appropriated in cyclic existence.

original: nyon mongs ma lus zhes @102a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus zhes @102a * //
translated: The net of existence is the net of afflictions. Since one is not liberated from that, it is a net. Manjushri is the one who destroys the net of existence by meditating on the meaning of reality, because he destroys all afflictions.🔽He destroys the entire net of existence.

original: pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas /
analyzed: pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas /
translated: The twelve links of dependent origination are as follows.🔽

original: rga shi'i bar gyi rten 'brel nyon mongs pa de rje btsun gyis zhi bar byed do //🔽'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar gyi rten 'brel nyon mongs pa de rje btsun gyis zhi bar byed do // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin //
translated: The pa is the venerable one who pacifies the afflictions, the dependent origination from the condition of ignorance up to the formations, up to aging and death.

original: zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i skam sar phyin pa ni rje btsun no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i skam sar phyin pa ni rje btsun no //
translated: The gone to the other shore of the ocean of samsara is the venerable one who has gone to the dry land of nirvana.

original: ye shes dbang bskur zhes pa ni kun du bzad po'i ye shes la /
analyzed: ye shes dbang bskur zhes pa ni kun du bzad po'i ye shes la /
translated: The empowerment of gnosis is the gnosis of Samantabhadra.

original: de dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the crown empowerment.

original: dbu rgyan de yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: dbu rgyan de yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
translated: That crown is the perfect buddha.

original: rigs lnga rgyan du thogs pa yang rje btsun no //
analyzed: rigs lnga rgyan du thogs pa yang rje btsun no //
translated: The venerable one is also the one who wears the ornaments of the five families.

original: man ngag tu 'dis slob ma dbang bskur ba mtshon te /
analyzed: man ngag tu 'dis slob ma dbang bskur ba mtshon te /
translated: In the esoteric instructions, this illustrates the empowerment of the disciples.

original: ye shes dbang ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga'o //
analyzed: ye shes dbang ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga'o //
translated: The empowerment of gnosis is the five empowerments of the family.

original: cod pan ni dar dpyangs so //
analyzed: cod pan ni dar dpyangs so //
translated: The crown is the hanging tassels.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
translated: The perfect buddha ornaments

original: zhes pa ni dbu rgyan rigs lngas dbang bskur ba de bkar te bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbu rgyan rigs lngas dbang bskur ba de bkar te bstan pa'o //
translated: is the crown empowerment of the five families.

original: ye shes lnga bskyed cing bzhag pa dang ma rig pa lnga 'khyud pa'i phyir dbang po'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga bskyed cing bzhag pa dang ma rig pa lnga 'khyud pa'i phyir dbang po'o //
translated: Since the five pristine consciousnesses are generated and placed, and the five ignorances are embraced, they are the sense organs.

original: sdug bsngal gsum gyis zhes pa sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dmyal ba dang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal te ming dang mtshan nyid kyi sdug bsngal skye rgan 'chi ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gsum gyis zhes pa sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dmyal ba dang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal te ming dang mtshan nyid kyi sdug bsngal skye rgan 'chi ste /
translated: Since the three sufferings are embraced, the suffering of suffering is hell, and the five appropriated aggregates are suffering, the suffering of suffering is birth, aging, and death.

original: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste de yang rje btsun no //
analyzed: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste de yang rje btsun no //
translated: The result is the truth of suffering, and that is also the venerable one.

original: sdug bsngal ni kun 'byung la bya ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni kun 'byung la bya ste /
translated: Suffering is to be taken as the origin,

original: 'bras bu sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i ming rgyu la btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i ming rgyu la btags pa'o //
translated: because the result is named after the cause.

original: zhi ba ni 'gog pa la bya ste /
analyzed: zhi ba ni 'gog pa la bya ste /
translated: Peace is to be taken as cessation,

original: rgyu 'bras kyi sdug bsngal gong ma gnyis zhi ba ste de yang 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras kyi sdug bsngal gong ma gnyis zhi ba ste de yang 'jam dpal lo //
translated: because the two previous sufferings of cause and result are pacified, and that is also Mañjuśrī.
